presentation: I am a passionate developer based in Argentina🌎. I specialize in developing client/server applications using the MERN and PERN javascript stacks💻. My goal is to contribute to innovative and challenging projects that not only enrich my professional experience, but also mark a significant milestone in my career.🥇

Below you will find a selection of my most recent projects💼. If something you see catches your attention💡 or if you have any collaboration proposals, do not hesitate to contact me🤝. I am always open to new opportunities and challenges.💪
Explore my portfolio, you will find my projects, my resume, programmer phrases, a form where you can contact me and more.
webDevelopmentDescription: Full Stack Developer with training in JavaScript, ReactJS, Node.js, Nextjs, TypeScript, Java, Express, CSS, HTML, MongoDB, Postgre SQL and Sequelize, specialized in Front-end. Knowledge of agile methodologies, GIT, UX, UI, data structure, algorithms.
educationDescription: I hold a degree in Technological Specialization in Software Development 👨‍🎓 and have completed rigorous bootcamps including "Henry," "Egg Cooperation," and "Free Code Camp," among others. Additionally, I am currently studying a University Degree in Programming at the National Technological University.📚
